channel.title: Items Disappearing in Nether
channel.description: I'm not quite sure how the nether works, but I was recently killed by a ghast in the Nether. I saw my items pop out into a safe place. I respawned and was able to make it back to the Nether in under a minute. I went to where I died, and my items were gone. Is that normal?

item.title: Items Disappearing in Nether
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“xryz, post:5, topic:406299”][quote author=zyle1992 link=topic=503297.msg3682716#msg3682716 date=1311637670]

ghast killed your items with fire.

You probably didn’t respawn quick enough so the ghast blew up your items as well.

But would the ghast still burn the items even if you died? Seems like there would be no “threat” since I was already dead.
[/quote]

was the fire, created by the ghast, near the items?[/quote]

No, I saw some items pop into my tunnel entrance about 3 blocks away. In fact, I don’t think there was any fire. I just saw the fireball, braced for impact, and when it hit me, I died, but I didn’t see any fire on the ground.

Read full topic
